summary: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.
cast: William Prael|Diane Ayala Goldner|Juan Fernández|Josh Stewart|Michael Reilly Burke|Andrea Roth|Karley Scott Collins|Madeline Zima|Haley Pullos|Daniella Alonso|Patrick Rizzotti|Jayme Suzonne Riser|Krystal Mayo|Michele Diane Pate|Nicole Antranette Fisher|Robert Wisdom|Joe Conger|Alex Feldman|Michael Showers|Todd Haberkorn|Tom Gulager|Brett Forbes|Lee Cole|Hiro Koda|Jabari Thomas|Jackson Beals|David Landsness|Jennifer Monroe|Gregory Alan Williams|Robyn Noble|Tommy K.|Aero|Jon Dainty|Eric Kelly McFarland|William Morse|David Pitt|Philip Poth|Colvin Roberson|John Snell
title: The Collector
